text: أَمْ لَهُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ غَيْرُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ سُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ

translation.en.sahih: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
translation.id.indonesian: Ataukah mereka mempunyai tuhan selain Allah. Maha Suci Allah dari apa yang mereka persekutukan.
